mapper.select: select r.num,address,point,storename from( select row_number() over(order by m.point desc)num, m.address,m.point,m.storename from( select SUBSTR(address,INSTR(address,' '),INSTR(address,' ',1,1)-2)addr, point from master where storename=#{storename})s, master m where SUBSTR(address,INSTR(address,' '),INSTR(address,' ',1,1)-2)=s.addr)r where num BETWEEN 1 and 5

select r.num,address,point,storename from( select row_number() over(order by m.point desc)num, m.address,m.point,m.storename from( select SUBSTR(address,INSTR(address,' '),INSTR(address,' ',1,1)-2)addr, point from master where storename=#{storename})s, master m where SUBSTR(address,INSTR(address,' '),INSTR(address,' ',1,1)-2)=s.addr)r where storename=#{storename}
